title: Page of Coins
text:
Page of Coins (or Jack/Knave of Coins/Pentacles) is a card used in Latin suited playing cards which include <a href="tarot">tarot decks</a>. It is part of what <a href="tarot%20reading">tarot card readers</a> call the "<a href="Minor%20Arcana">Minor Arcana</a>".
Tarot cards are used throughout much of <a href="Europe">Europe</a> to play <a href="tarot%20card%20games">tarot card games</a>.
In <a href="English%20language">English</a>-speaking countries, where the games are largely unknown, Tarot cards came to be utilized primarily for <a href="Tarot%20reading">divinatory</a> purposes.
Divination usage.
Often used to represent a young person. Can mean a changing of your line of work and/or taking on more responsibility. But primarily, this is the card for students.
